javax.swing.text.html

Interface CSSBorder.BorderPainter

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CSSBorder.DottedDashedPainter, CSSBorder.DoublePainter, CSSBorder.GrooveRidgePainter, CSSBorder.InsetOutsetPainter, CSSBorder.NullPainter, CSSBorder.ShadowLightPainter, CSSBorder.SolidPainter, CSSBorder.StrokePainter
    Enclosing class:
    CSSBorder

    static interface CSSBorder.BorderPainter

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void paint(Polygon shape, Graphics g, Color color, int side)
      The painter should paint the border as if it were at the top and the coordinates of the NW corner of the interior area is (0, 0).

    • Method Detail

      • paint

        void paint(Polygon shape,
         Graphics g,
         Color color,
         int side)
        The painter should paint the border as if it were at the top and the coordinates of the NW corner of the interior area is (0, 0). The caller is responsible for the appropriate affine transformations. Clip is set by the caller to the exact border shape so it's safe to simply draw into the shape's bounding rectangle.
